dcterms:creator: Leandro Silva
Mainack Modal
Denzil Correa
Fabrio Benevenuto
Ingmar Weber
dcterms:description: A dataset containing approximately 17.2 million potentially racist tweets collected from Twitter over a three-month period, filtered to include tweets containing specific keywords related to racial and ethnic slurs.
dcterms:title: Unlabeled Dataset

dcterms:creator: Pete Burnap
Matthew L. Williams
dcterms:description: A gold standard dataset created through crowdsourcing, containing 8,358 tweets annotated by users to determine whether they are racist or not.
dcterms:title: Classification Dataset
